effect.name: Background Offset (No Antialiasing)
effect.description: Offsets the background using the object's texture (Red for X, Green for Y). This version also uses the object's alpha channel as mask.
effect.author: Looki, Edit by NaitorStudios

parameter.name: Width
parameter.description: Width of the shift in pixels.

parameter.name: Height
parameter.description: Height of the shift in pixels.
